column4: snowblink,ok, now im in /usr/share/gdesklets/Displays, then what shall i type?
man gdesklets.  it gives you the syntax for adding displays.
and double-click on any you want to try.  that should work, but i'm going from memory.
when using nautilus, shall i then run from root?
gdesklets are a user program; you don't need root privileges to run it.
when dubbelclicking, it cannot open the .display
hmm.  ok, try reading the manpage for gdesklets; i think all you have to do is 'gdesklets /usr/share/gdesklets/Displays/name-of-desklet.display' but I could be wrong. :)
let me know if that works.
you should be adding something that has an extension of .display
when im trying one of the .Display it says No preview tag for file:///usr/share/gdesklets/Displays/boxmail-desklet/boxmail.display
